title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump Bluntly Threatens North Korea
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump Bluntly Threatens North Korea
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Margaret Talev Senior White House Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing President Trump bluntly threatening North Korea with annihilation and delivered a provocative argument to leaders of the world that the U.S. and other nations should always act in their self-interest even when confronting collective threats.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
